characterDescription:
Rill was a mercenary on some of the same caravans that Moash worked before ending up in the bridge crews. He came to Moash once they were free of slavery. He is now a member of the conspiracy, along with Moash, Graves, Danlan, and another unidentified man intent upon assassinating King Elhokar.
He tells Kaladin that the king is incompetent. That he gets good men killed. That he lets the bastard Sadeas get away with high treason.
